rows.label: tlk001101_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I had a brief chat with some people earlier,
and everyone was so kind and gentle...

rows.label: tlk001101_01_msg0003
rows.name: It's also so peaceful and calm...

rows.label: tlk001101_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I will be resting here, so please,
Rex-sama, take your time.
